meanings.definition: To possess or have something as one's own.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it owns the entire house!
meanings.sent4: His determination to own the competition was evident.
meanings.sent5: Owning a pet requires responsibility and care.

meanings.definition: Used for emphasis, to emphasize possession or ownership.
meanings.sent2: She wore her own dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The puppy made its own bed out of pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like her own ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: Having your own room gives you privacy and space.

meanings.definition: To acknowledge or admit something as true or valid.
meanings.sent1: I own my mistake and will fix it.
meanings.sent2: She owns her success and hard work.
meanings.sent3: He had to own up to eating all the cookies.
meanings.sent4: The team had to own their defeat and learn from it.
meanings.sent5: Owning your feelings is important for personal growth.
